name: Aggro Strike
text: Assist. Increase the damage this attack deals by 1♦ for each ♥ in your discard pile.

name: Agility
text: If you paid with a ♢, draw 2.

name: Anticipate
text: When you would suffer ♠ from a behavior card effect, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage.

name: Assistance
text: Assist. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, reduce the stamina cost of any ◆ other players play by 1.

name: Attack Plan
text: Assist. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, any damage dealt to the monster by any source is increased by 1♦.

name: Battle Trance
text: Taunt. ✘: Draw 2.

name: Beyond Limits
text: Taunt. You may suffer 1♦ damage. If you do, increase the damage this attack deals by 2♦ and choose a player to draw 1.

name: Bulwark
text: Increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1. When another player would suffer ♠ and you are in the front sector, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage. If you do, you and that player draw 1.

name: Concentrated Attack
text: Choose another player. Increase the damage this attack deals by 1♦ for each ◆ in that player's discard pile. If this attack inflicts a wound, inflict vulnerable.

name: Coordinated Attack
text: Assist. Choose a player to draw 1.

name: Counterattack
text: When you suffer ♠, you may discard this card from your hand to deal 3♦ damage.

name: Drawn To Danger
text: Taunt. Increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1.

name: Eye of the Storm
text: Reveal any number of cards with assist from your hand. Then choose another player to draw that many cards.

name: Feint
text: When you discard this card from your hand, draw 1.

name: Golden Opportunity
text: Taunt. Choose a player to reveal up to 2 ◆ from their hand and deal their weapon damage for each card they revealed this way.

name: Guardian Shield
text: When the monster would unleash, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do and you are in the front sector, prevent that unleash damage (no player suffers damage).

name: Immolate
text: Choose another player to draw 1. You may suffer ♠. If you do, all other players draw 1 instead.

name: Last Breath
text: Resilience. Deal damage to the monster equal to the damage you currently sustain.

name: Mettle
text: If your health is critical, this card counts as ◆◆ for the attrition check this turn.

name: Momentum
text: ◆◇: Search your discard pile for a ◆ and add it to your hand.

name: Monstrous Effort
text: Resilience. If your health is critical, you can play the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Outflank
text: At the start of another player's turn, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Over Here!
text: Taunt. You may suffer ♠. If you do, choose a player to recycle up to 2 cards.

name: Perseverance
text: Draw 1.

name: Pulsating Fury
text: If you are the aggro player, draw cards equal to the current stance number.

name: Push
text: Opening: Draw 2.

name: Rally
text: Choose a player to draw 1 or immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Rapid Dash
text: Taunt. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, all other players' weapons have +1♦ damage.

name: Retribution
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by X where X is the damage you currently sustain.

name: Sacrifice
text: Assist. Resilience. When the monster would gain struggle, you may suffer ♠ and discard this card from your hand to prevent that struggle gain.

name: Shield Block
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand to cancel the effects of that behavior card and confuse the monster.

name: Shield Dance
text: While your mastery is focused, ignore the stamina cost of this card. ◆◇: Increase the damage this attack deals by 3♦.

name: Shield Smash
text: Deal your weapon damage. You may choose to suffer ♠ to deal double that damage instead.

name: Shield Strike
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by 1♦ for each ◆ in your discard pile.

name: Shield Wall
text: Assist. When another player in your sector would suffer ♠, if this card is the top card of your discard pile, you may suffer that ♠ instead.

name: Shielded Strike
text: ◆◇: Remove 2 struggle. ✘: Increase the damage this attack deals by 1♦ for each ♢ in your sequence.

name: Snare
text: If you avoid attrition damage this turn, deal your weapon damage for each ♢ in your sequence.

name: Stamina Surge
text: When you discard this card to generate stamina for a ◆, it generates ♦♦. ✘: Reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play in your sequence by 1.

name: Surround
text: This maneuver removes 1 struggle for each occupied sector.

name: Tactical Evade
text: Search your discard pile for a card with assist and add it to your hand.

name: Teamwork
text: While another player is paying the stamina cost of a card, you may discard this card from your hand in order to reduce that cost by 2.

name: Tempered Pain
text: Resilience. You may suffer 1♦ damage to draw 1.

name: Tempo
text: ◇◆: Remove 1 struggle.

name: Undaunted Charge
text: Remove 2 struggle. ✘: Confuse the monster. All other players draw 1.
